location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Lieutenant George Herne, commanding the Honourable Company's Cruiser Benares, off Katiffe [Al-Qaṭīf]

mods.abstract: Riach hopes that the Nautiluswill be able to make it to Herne's station before he has to leave for Bahrene [Bahrain] for provisions, because it would be a shame if the neighbourhood of Rahma been Jauber [Raḥmah bin Jābir] were left without a vessel to watch his intentions.
